argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_elong | |- ( A e. _V -> ( A e. On <-> Ord A ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_suceloni | |- ( A e. On -> suc A e. On ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eloni | |- ( suc A e. On -> Ord suc A ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. On -> Ord suc A ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_syl6bir | |- ( A e. _V -> ( Ord A -> Ord suc A ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_sucidg | |- ( A e. _V -> A e. suc A ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ordelord | |- ( ( Ord suc A /\ A e. suc A ) -> Ord A ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_ex | |- ( Ord suc A -> ( A e. suc A -> Ord A ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl5com | |- ( A e. _V -> ( Ord suc A -> Ord A ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_impbid | |- ( A e. _V -> ( Ord A <-> Ord suc A ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_sucprc | |- ( -. A e. _V -> suc A = A ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( -. A e. _V -> A = suc A ) |
| 13 |  | #P_ordeq | |- ( A = suc A -> ( Ord A <-> Ord suc A ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( -. A e. _V -> ( Ord A <-> Ord suc A ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_pm2.61i | |- ( Ord A <-> Ord suc A ) |
